author.title: Keyboard Drum Kit
author.description: An interactive drum machine where keyboard keys trigger drum sounds using the Web Audio API. Press Q, W, E, R, A, S, D, F keys to play different drum samples. Features auto-play patterns, tempo control, and visual step sequencer.

author.title: Monster Hunter - Mini Mario Game
author.description: A platformer game featuring Mario-style gameplay with monster hunting elements. Jump between platforms, collect coins, defeat monsters with projectiles, and avoid deadly spikes. Features multiple levels with increasing difficulty, score tracking, and lives system.

author.title: Mood Tracker
author.description: Daily mood tracking interface with trend visualization and mental health insights. Monitor emotional well-being with 8 mood options, view weekly patterns through interactive charts, receive personalized insights, and get expert mental health tips to support emotional awareness and well-being.

author.title: Calorie Burn Tracker
author.description: A comprehensive fitness application that helps users track calories burned through various activities. Features activity-based input with comparison charts, detailed logging, and insights for total and average calorie burn. Supports multiple activities like running, cycling, swimming, and more with accurate MET-based calculations.

author.title: Meal Planner 🥗
author.description: A comprehensive daily meal planning application that helps users create balanced, nutritious meal plans with nutrition tracking, progress visualization, and smart meal suggestions. Features meal organization by categories, real-time nutrition monitoring, interactive charts, and customizable daily goals to support healthy eating habits.

author.title: Meditation Tracker
author.description: A serene meditation tracking application that helps users monitor their mindfulness practice. Features session duration logging, calm score ratings (1-10), progress visualization with interactive charts, streak tracking, and helpful meditation tips. Includes beautiful gradient design, local storage persistence, and comprehensive statistics to support consistent meditation habits.

author.title: Weight Progress Tracker 📈
author.description: A comprehensive weight tracking application with monthly progress charts, target setting, statistics dashboard, and motivational features. Track your weight loss/gain journey with visual progress indicators, data persistence, and practical weight management tips.

author.title: Activity Summary Dashboard 🚴
author.description: A comprehensive activity tracking dashboard that provides unified insights into daily activities. Features activity logging with time-spent graphs, wellness scoring, personalized tips, and detailed analytics. Includes categorization of physical, mental, social, and work activities with interactive charts and data export functionality.

author.title: Breathing Exercise UI 🫁
author.description: An interactive guided breathing exercise application with multiple techniques including 4-7-8 breathing, box breathing, and deep breathing. Features animated breath cycles, voice guidance, customizable patterns, session tracking, and relaxation tips for stress relief and mindfulness practice.

author.title: Nasal Breathing Compliance Tracker
author.description: Track nasal breathing consistency during workouts, sleep, and daily activities. Monitor compliance percentages, log session details, and visualize progress trends to improve respiratory health and athletic performance.

author.title: Body Temperature Log 🌡️
author.description: A comprehensive body temperature tracking application for health monitoring during illness. Features temperature logging with multiple measurement methods, trend charts, fever alerts, health status indicators, and medical export functionality. Supports both Celsius and Fahrenheit with professional health insights.

author.title: Thermoregulation Stability Monitor 🌡️
author.description: Track body temperature regulation stability to identify patterns that may indicate stress, illness, or recovery status. Monitor daily temperature variations, calculate stability index, and get health insights from temperature patterns.

author.title: Micronutrient Diversity Index 🥗
author.description: Track dietary diversity across essential micronutrients to prevent nutrient gaps from limited food choices. Log food intake by category, calculate diversity scores, visualize nutrient coverage with heatmaps, and get personalized dietary recommendations.

author.title: Doctor Visit History 🧑‍⚕️
author.description: A comprehensive medical visit history tracker to help users maintain their healthcare records. Features visit logging with doctor details, diagnosis, medications, and notes, a chronological timeline view of all visits, and a general notes section for ongoing health observations. Improves medical record keeping and helps prevent forgetting past diagnoses and treatments.

author.title: Running Distance Tracker
author.description: A beautiful running distance and pace tracking UI with performance graphs and helpful tips for runners to analyze pace improvement.

author.title: Running Cadence Tracker
author.description: Track your running cadence to optimize stride efficiency. Log runs with distance, time, and steps per minute. Features improvement graphs, optimal range indicators (170-190 spm), and performance statistics. Helps runners improve their running form and efficiency.

author.title: Aerobic Base Builder Tracker
author.description: Track low-intensity Zone 2 aerobic training volume to build endurance foundation. Log sessions with heart rate monitoring, perceived effort tracking, and weekly progress visualization. Features Zone 2 compliance analysis, consistency scoring, and personalized training insights for optimal aerobic development.

author.title: Muscle Group Recovery Tracker
author.description: Track recovery times for individual muscle groups to prevent overtraining and optimize workout scheduling. Log workouts by muscle group with intensity levels, view recovery status dashboard, and visualize recovery timelines. Features color-coded status indicators, training statistics, and overtraining prevention alerts.

author.title: Liver Function Tracker
author.description: Monitor liver health through enzyme level tracking with medical reference ranges. Log ALT, AST, bilirubin, and ALP levels with automatic status indicators. Features trend analysis, health insights, comprehensive medical reference guide, and warning alerts for abnormal values. Helps users track liver function over time and identify potential health concerns early.

author.title: Emotional Recovery Time Tracker
